justification: The Methods section states that "participants in the Gaussian conditions additionally performed the Berlin Numeracy Test (Cokely et al., 2012)", indicating this test was used to assess participants’ numeracy/risk-literacy skills.

The same passage notes that participants "performed … a brief number line estimation task ("number-to-position"; Siegler & Opfer, 2003)", showing this task was employed to measure participants’ ability to estimate numerical magnitudes on a number line.
